data.message: Thank you to Mark and the Facebook Team. I have contact with people from around the world. After my mom has complained, that she can not read the info in English on our common Star Cliff Richard, I have created a German Fanclub page, which has almost 3,000 fans. It is simply wonderful to share pictures and videos with many fans from all over the world. And we can help people who are ill, or have to worry about.

replies.message: Oh and thanks for The Video Option. Better than YouTube : https://www.facebook.com/cliffrichardfanclubgermany/posts/1681825708766614
